title: Update and Refine RFC for User Documentation of Distributed In-Memory Database
description: Refine the RFC task to provide a more detailed breakdown of the user documentation requirements for the distributed in-memory database. Update the dependencies, assign the task to a suitable role, and set the rfc_state field according to its current progress.
dependencies: Define System Architecture for Distributed In-Memory Database
Complete Preliminary Design of User Documentation

title: Develop Lock Acquisition Algorithm
description: Create a scalable and efficient lock acquisition algorithm that ensures consistency in a distributed environment.

title: Implement Deadlock Detection and Prevention Strategy
description: Develop a strategy for detecting and preventing deadlocks in the distributed system.

title: Design Client Interface for Lock Management
description: Create an intuitive and user-friendly interface for clients to interact with the lock manager.

title: Implement Persistence Layer for Lock Information
description: Develop a database schema and implementation to store lock information persistently.

title: Perform Unit Tests for Lock Manager Components
description: Write unit tests to verify the correct functionality of each component in the lock manager.
dependencies: Implement Deadlock Detection and Prevention Strategy
Design Client Interface for Lock Management
Implement Persistence Layer for Lock Information

title: Perform Integration Tests for the Entire System
description: Write integration tests to verify the correct interaction between all components in the lock manager.
dependencies: Perform Unit Tests for Lock Manager Components

title: Write User Guide and API Documentation
description: Create a user guide and API documentation for the DistributedLockManager.
dependencies: Design Client Interface for Lock Management
